in a way that looks like an oval: The young leaves of the plant are small and ovally rounded. The queen pulled aside the white sheet covering the ovally shaped painting.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cacao tree produces an ovally elongated fruit, the seed of which is used to make chocolate. The racetrack is ovally curved with a single lap consisting of one and a half miles. An ovally shaped light patch remained on the wallpaper where the portrait had been hanging for many years.
